title: IT HAPPENED ONE NIGHT 1934 - CLARK GABLE

sources.title: IT HAPPENED ONE NIGHT 1934 - CLARK GABLE
sources.description: It's a movie.It Happened One Night is a 1934 American pre-Code romantic comedy film with elements of screwball comedy directed and co-produced by Frank Capra, in collaboration with Harry Cohn, in which a pampered socialite tries to get out from under her father's thumb and falls in love with a roguish reporter. The screenplay by Robert Riskin is based on the August 1933 short story "Night Bus" by Samuel Hopkins Adams, which provided the shooting title.
